Title: Manu Bhaker, D Gukesh, and Two Other Athletes Set to Receive Prestigious Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna Award
Description: Four remarkable athletes, including Manu Bhaker and D Gukesh, are set to receive India’s highest sporting honour on January 17, 2025.

Title: Nagpur Double Murder: 21-Year-Old Utkarsh Dakhole Allegedly Kills Parents After Failing Engineering Exams Multiple Times
Description: A 21-year-old engineering student allegedly killed his parents in a fit of rage over academic failures and parental pressure.

Title: Breaking: New York Mass Shooting—At least 11 Shot Outside Amazura Nightclub in Queens
Description: A mass shooting outside the Amazura Night Club on New Year’s Eve left 11 injured, with suspects still allegedly at large.

Title: Vandalism on Indian Railways: Man Tears Seat Cover, Throws It Out of Moving Train for Reels; Internet Demands Action
Description: A viral video of a passenger tearing a seat cover on an Indian train has provoked widespread outrage online.
